titles.title: To amend the Small Business Act to increase the maximum amount for which a loan can be made under the Microloan Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Amends the Small Business Act to increase from $35,000 to $50,000 the maximum individual loan amount under the Microloan Program (a program of start-up assistance for women, low-income, veteran, and minority entrepreneurs and business owners and businesses located in economically distressed areas).
